attributes.action: Erect a statue of Homer Simpson outside Parliament to reflect the average intelligence of the British Politician
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Politicians are totally out of touch with the people now and live in a Homer Simpson world of their own. erect a statue outside Parliament to remind them as they enter of what they are behaving like!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
